title: China Economics: Macro Webcast: Recovery to Regain Footing After a Rough Start
description: This webcast focuses on China's economic recovery efforts following initial challenges. It will explore the strategies employed to stabilize and improve economic growth after a period of difficulty.

title: China Economics: Macro Webcast: Omicron in China: Impact and Policy Implications
description: This session examines the effects of the Omicron variant on China's economy and the resulting policy implications. It will delve into the economic disruptions caused by the pandemic and the government's response.

title: Thursday Macro Webcast: Correction: Impacts From Higher Materials Prices + Easy Comp for 2Q21, Less Easy Revisions
description: This webcast discusses Impacts From Higher Materials Prices + Easy Comp for 2Q21, Less Easy Revisions, offering insights and analysis pertinent to the subject matter.

title: Thursday Macro Webcast: Impacts From Higher Materials Prices + Easy Comp for 2Q21, Less Easy Revisions
description: This webcast discusses Impacts From Higher Materials Prices + Easy Comp for 2Q21, Less Easy Revisions, offering insights and analysis pertinent to the subject matter.

title: China Economics: Macro Webcast: Consumption Conundrum and Reaction to Fed Pivot
description: This webcast analyzes the complexities of consumption patterns in China amidst global economic shifts and the Federal Reserve's policy changes. It aims to understand consumer behavior and the broader economic repercussions.
